WRITING.TITLE: The Secret Life of Walter Mitty (Ben stiller one)

WRITING.TEXT: Totally agree on Mendelsohn and Chandler being at the top of their games. I am very proud of Danny for getting his act together and being hired by Vader to build the Death Star :)
